4242990662,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/staff-data-scientist-adtech-deep-learning-at-delivery-hero-4242990662?position=32&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=woTYIqJ%2B1S0SCzTf4m9Cdw%3D%3D,"Staff Data Scientist - (AdTech, Deep Learning)",Delivery Hero,"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","As the world’s pioneering local delivery platform, our mission is to deliver an amazing experience, fast, easy, and to your door. We operate in over 70+ countries worldwide, powered by tech, designed by people. As one of Europe’s largest tech platforms, headquartered in Berlin, Germany. Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.
Job Description
We are looking for Staff Data Scientists (all genders) to join the Ad Tech data science team in our mission to deliver consistently amazing experiences.

You will be a thought leader, driving innovation by designing and deploying our models to the forefront of technology to solve complex problems, delivering revenue for Delivery Hero at the frontline of our growth & profitability journey.

At Delivery Hero, AdTech introduces people to new food they love and enables our partners to meet their future customers at the perfect moment. We have developed a range of products to offer advertising solutions for restaurants helping them to increase their visibility and reach, improve their order conversion, and eventually drive more sales by covering the entire marketing funnel. Operating across over 50 countries around the clock, our Ad Tech connects the ideal advertiser with the ideal customer millions of times every day. In 2024/25, Ad Tech is a fundamental area for us on our path to profitability and is predicted to generate more than 1 billion euros in revenue for Delivery Hero
column2: our data science team is at the heart of this growth, powering personalisation, relevance, and recommendation.

column1: The Ad Tech data science team operates within the wider Vendor Data tribe whose mission is to drive innovation, insight-driven decision making and to solve business problems through a culture of excellence and openness. The tribe comprises teams of skilled analysts, engineers, and scientists working together to deliver data solutions covering a host of business opportunities across all of Delivery Hero’s 70+ markets.
If you're a creative problem solver who is hungry for a new adventure, an international workplace is waiting for you in the heart of Berlin!
Your mission:

Spearhead a revolution of Ad Tech at Delivery Hero through the innovative application of cutting edge tools and techniques such as neural networks and reinforcement learning covering areas such as ad ranking, bidding strategies, and ad pacing driving unparalleled improvements in advertising campaigns.
Analyse large-scale datasets to understand and identify opportunities deploying sophisticated statistical techniques to improve ad relevance, click-through rates, and conversion metrics.

Lead research initiatives to explore emerging trends and technologies in AdTech and machine learning, contributing to the advancement of Delivery Hero's advertising products and algorithms. Remain at the forefront of industry and research developments incorporating new methodologies and best practices into our data science workflows and models.

Serve as a subject matter expert in data science and machine learning, providing guidance and mentorship to other team members and fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation within the data science team.
Your heroic skills:

You are an industry-leading talent at modelling business problems using machine learning techniques covering feature engineering, model selection and design as well as evaluation and optimisation to deliver enormous value to the business.
You raise the performance of other team members through effective and mature mentorship and constructive collaboration to benefit others from your deep understanding and experience of data science.

You have extensive expertise in building and training complex neural network models with strong knowledge of the Python data toolkit centering around deep learning i.e. Keras and ideally Tensorflow and TFX
Through the seamless use of SQL queries you are able to explore our data universe and gather data to support your analysis and the development of machine learning solutions.
You write clean, production-level code and are able to effectively set up your environment to minimise testing loops influencing the entire team to work more efficiently and reliably.
You are familiar with deploying and developing complex neural networks to serve live traffic and experience collaborating with ML engineers in cloud systems, ideally GCP.
You love to learn, are a critical thinker and creative problem solver who strives for excellence.
You are a team player who loves to collaborate and work with stakeholders from a variety of teams in a diverse environment.
Nice to have:
Implementing neural networks to specifically solve Ad Tech challenges would be highly desirable.
Additional Information

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience—just include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

Delivery Hero has been listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since 2017 and is part of the MDAX stock market index. We enable creative minds to deliver solutions that create impact within our ecosystem. We move fast, take action and adapt. No matter where you're from or what you believe in, we build, we deliver, we lead. We are Delivery Hero.

Job Description

We are looking for Staff Data Scientists (all genders) to join the Ad Tech data science team in our mission to deliver consistently amazing experiences.

You will be a thought leader, driving innovation by designing and deploying our models to the forefront of technology to solve complex problems, delivering revenue for Delivery Hero at the frontline of our growth &
column2:
profitability journey.

At Delivery Hero, AdTech introduces people to new food they love and enables our partners to meet their future customers at the perfect moment. We have developed a range of products to offer advertising solutions for restaurants helping them to increase their visibility and reach, improve their order conversion, and eventually drive more sales by covering the entire marketing funnel. Operating across over 50 countries around the clock, our Ad Tech connects the ideal advertiser with the ideal customer millions of times every day. In 2024/25, Ad Tech is a fundamental area for us on our path to profitability and is predicted to generate more than 1 billion euros in revenue for Delivery Hero
column3:
our data science team is at the heart of this growth, powering personalisation, relevance, and recommendation.

The Ad Tech data science team operates within the wider Vendor Data tribe whose mission is to drive innovation, insight-driven decision making and to solve business problems through a culture of excellence and openness. The tribe comprises teams of skilled analysts, engineers, and scientists working together to deliver data solutions covering a host of business opportunities across all of Delivery Hero’s 70+ markets.

If you're a creative problem solver who is hungry for a new adventure, an international workplace is waiting for you in the heart of Berlin!

Your mission:

  • Spearhead a revolution of Ad Tech at Delivery Hero through the innovative application of cutting edge tools and techniques such as neural networks and reinforcement learning covering areas such as ad ranking, bidding strategies, and ad pacing driving unparalleled improvements in advertising campaigns.
  • Analyse large-scale datasets to understand and identify opportunities deploying sophisticated statistical techniques to improve ad relevance, click-through rates, and conversion metrics.
  • Lead research initiatives to explore emerging trends and technologies in AdTech and machine learning, contributing to the advancement of Delivery Hero's advertising products and algorithms. Remain at the forefront of industry and research developments incorporating new methodologies and best practices into our data science workflows and models.
  • Serve as a subject matter expert in data science and machine learning, providing guidance and mentorship to other team members and fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation within the data science team.

Your heroic skills:

  • You are an industry-leading talent at modelling business problems using machine learning techniques covering feature engineering, model selection and design as well as evaluation and optimisation to deliver enormous value to the business.
  • You raise the performance of other team members through effective and mature mentorship and constructive collaboration to benefit others from your deep understanding and experience of data science.
  • You have extensive expertise in building and training complex neural network models with strong knowledge of the Python data toolkit centering around deep learning i.e. Keras and ideally Tensorflow and TFX
  • Through the seamless use of SQL queries you are able to explore our data universe and gather data to support your analysis and the development of machine learning solutions.
  • You write clean, production-level code and are able to effectively set up your environment to minimise testing loops influencing the entire team to work more efficiently and reliably.
  • You are familiar with deploying and developing complex neural networks to serve live traffic and experience collaborating with ML engineers in cloud systems, ideally GCP.
  • You love to learn, are a critical thinker and creative problem solver who strives for excellence.
  • You are a team player who loves to collaborate and work with stakeholders from a variety of teams in a diverse environment.

Nice to have:

  • Implementing neural networks to specifically solve Ad Tech challenges would be highly desirable.

Additional Information

We believe diversity and inclusion are key to creating not only an exciting product, but also an amazing customer and employee experience. Fostering this starts with hiring - therefore we do not discriminate on the basis of racial identities, religious beliefs, color, national origin, gender identities or expressions, sexual orientations, age, marital or disability statuses, or any other aspect that makes you, you. We encourage you to let us know if you need any accommodations or specific accessibility support to ensure a smooth interview experience—just include it in your application. You're welcome to share your pronouns (he/she/they) right from the start so we can address you respectfully from our first contact.

4278777294,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/head-of-data-science-m-f-d-at-stenon-4278777294?position=34&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=gJST3SF151NL30YASNrz7A%3D%3D,Head of Data Science (m/f/d),stenon,"Potsdam, Brandenburg, Germany","Stenon offers the world’s first real-time soil analysis solution for agriculture. With our IoT solution consisting of intelligent sensor fusion, artificial intelligence and data analysis, we are solving a major and global problem in agriculture and society. We provide the necessary data for cultivation optimization that is currently not economically accessible and thus creates extreme value for farmers.

Stenon is expanding internationally. At Stenon, we pride ourselves on having a diverse and dynamic team spread across our offices in Germany and Brazil. As we continue to grow, we are committed to fostering a collaborative and inclusive environment that supports our global workforce.
Position

We seek a versatile and experienced Head of Data Science, that drives and expands our existing soil nutrient machine learning as well as new data driven features, that support our customers in making better agronomic decisions for their fields using real-time soil data. You will report directly to the CTO.
Tasks
Lead the Data-Science Team
Be responsible for a core pillar of stenons products
Scale our soil nutrient modelling to support more and more regions across the world
Oversee planning, execution and delivery of Data Science projects.
Be part of the stenon leadership team and collaborate across functions with Product, Commercial and Engineering
Own the Data Science strategy, vision and roadmap, enhancing stenons agronomy intelligence layer with additional features and data sources
Requirements
At least 5+ years of hands-on experience in Data Science products
Experience in managing and mentoring people
Advanced Degree in Engineering or Science
Proven track record of managing complex projects from start to finish
Exceptional understanding of statistical concepts
Experience in geo-spatial and/or sensor data processing is considered a plus
Experience writing and maintaining python code and the full ML life cycle, incl. common libraries like scikit, pytorch as well as ML-Ops infrastructure like MLflow, DVC
A strong sense for data and code quality and the ability to push for high standards
Experience working directly with internal stakeholders (Product, Commercial, Engineering)
Very good communication and English language skills - verbal and written
Benefits
A fully remote or hybrid work setup - work anywhere in Germany
A role within a highly productive and supportive team full of dedicated, hard-working professionals
An agile work environment with flat hierarchies and an international team
Permanent full-time position with flexible work hours
Company provided laptop
Home office allowance
ABC Berlin/Potsdam Travel pass if needed
Team building and company retreats: Last year we went to Gran Canaria for a company retreat

We are on a mission to make soil data accessible in real-time, thus changing how farmers can cultivate their land. To achieve this, we put our customers first and try to understand the challenges they have deeply. This will allow us to build the best possible products. We value transparency and honesty to become as performant as possible. With an open yet always constructive feedback culture, we learn from each other and improve continuously. We have high standards and reward performance, but at the same time, we want to work with positive people who treat their colleagues exceptionally well.
Are you interested? We look forward to receiving your application! Please send your CV and cover letter.

Stenon offers the world’s first real-time soil analysis solution for agriculture. With our IoT solution consisting of intelligent sensor fusion, artificial intelligence and data analysis, we are solving a major and global problem in agriculture and society. We provide the necessary data for cultivation optimization that is currently not economically accessible and thus creates extreme value for farmers.


Stenon is expanding internationally. At Stenon, we pride ourselves on having a diverse and dynamic team spread across our offices in Germany and Brazil. As we continue to grow, we are committed to fostering a collaborative and inclusive environment that supports our global workforce.


Position


We seek a versatile and experienced Head of Data Science, that drives and expands our existing soil nutrient machine learning as well as new data driven features, that support our customers in making better agronomic decisions for their fields using real-time soil data. You will report directly to the CTO.


Tasks

  • Lead the Data-Science Team

  • Be responsible for a core pillar of stenons products

  • Scale our soil nutrient modelling to support more and more regions across the world

  • Oversee planning, execution and delivery of Data Science projects.

  • Be part of the stenon leadership team and collaborate across functions with Product, Commercial and Engineering

  • Own the Data Science strategy, vision and roadmap, enhancing stenons agronomy intelligence layer with additional features and data sources


Requirements

  • At least 5+ years of hands-on experience in Data Science products

  • Experience in managing and mentoring people

  • Advanced Degree in Engineering or Science

  • Proven track record of managing complex projects from start to finish

  • Exceptional understanding of statistical concepts

  • Experience in geo-spatial and/or sensor data processing is considered a plus

  • Experience writing and maintaining python code and the full ML life cycle, incl. common libraries like scikit, pytorch as well as ML-Ops infrastructure like MLflow, DVC

  • A strong sense for data and code quality and the ability to push for high standards

  • Experience working directly with internal stakeholders (Product, Commercial, Engineering)

  • Very good communication and English language skills - verbal and written


Benefits

  • A fully remote or hybrid work setup - work anywhere in Germany

  • A role within a highly productive and supportive team full of dedicated, hard-working professionals

  • An agile work environment with flat hierarchies and an international team

  • Permanent full-time position with flexible work hours

  • Company provided laptop

  • Home office allowance

  • ABC Berlin/Potsdam Travel pass if needed

  • Team building and company retreats: Last year we went to Gran Canaria for a company retreat


We are on a mission to make soil data accessible in real-time, thus changing how farmers can cultivate their land. To achieve this, we put our customers first and try to understand the challenges they have deeply. This will allow us to build the best possible products. We value transparency and honesty to become as performant as possible. With an open yet always constructive feedback culture, we learn from each other and improve continuously. We have high standards and reward performance, but at the same time, we want to work with positive people who treat their colleagues exceptionally well.


Are you interested? We look forward to receiving your application! Please send your CV and cover letter.

4280325804,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/machine-learning-engineer-tts-stt-at-impala-search-4280325804?position=35&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=aXDvh%2BNKNoITqIsnNnwM0g%3D%3D,"Machine Learning Engineer (TTS, STT)",Impala Search,"Berlin, Germany","Our client is on a mission to democratise AI‑powered voice agents — enabling businesses worldwide to automate customer and operational calls with intelligent, natural-sounding dialogue. With over 30 million automated calls handled, 4 million hours saved in contact centres, and 99.9% uptime, their no-code platform is powering the future of voice AI.
Backed by the investors behind Facebook and GroupOn and trusted by 1,000+ companies, they enable enterprises to deploy multilingual, human-like voice agents at scale.
Role Overview:

The ML Engineer will join the founding team, shaping real-time, low-latency speech systems from the ground up. This is a hands-on, architecture-level role - building end-to-end voice pipelines that combine ASR, LLMs, and TTS, and scaling them across mission-critical environments.
Key Responsibilities:
Design and deploy real-time ASR → LLM → TTS pipelines optimised for speed and naturalness
Fine-tune and integrate best-in-class open-source and commercial models across ASR, TTS, and LLMs
Optimise inference performance using techniques like quantisation, distillation, and RL-based tuning
Build high-throughput, low-latency APIs using Python, FastAPI, gRPC, and WebSocket streaming
Own deployment workflows across cloud and on-prem, collaborating on Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD
Stay ahead of the curve — run experiments, track new research, and help keep the team at the cutting edge
Qualifications:
Deep experience in Python.
Proven hands-on work with real-time ASR, TTS, voice chat, or streaming audio systems
Familiarity with LLM tooling - prompt design, fine-tuning, RAG, and frameworks like LangChain, LlamaIndex, or OpenPipe

You’ll push the boundaries of what voice AI can do in production - balancing model quality, latency, and scalability - while working across product, infra, and research to ship new capabilities into the hands of real users.
If you want to build the voice layer of enterprise AI - and work at the frontier of real-time language, speech, and systems - we’d love to hear from you.

Our client is on a mission to democratise AI‑powered voice agents — enabling businesses worldwide to automate customer and operational calls with intelligent, natural-sounding dialogue. With over 30 million automated calls handled, 4 million hours saved in contact centres, and 99.9% uptime, their no-code platform is powering the future of voice AI.


Backed by the investors behind Facebook and GroupOn and trusted by 1,000+ companies, they enable enterprises to deploy multilingual, human-like voice agents at scale.


Role Overview:


The ML Engineer will join the founding team, shaping real-time, low-latency speech systems from the ground up. This is a hands-on, architecture-level role - building end-to-end voice pipelines that combine ASR, LLMs, and TTS, and scaling them across mission-critical environments.


Key Responsibilities:


  • Design and deploy real-time ASR → LLM → TTS pipelines optimised for speed and naturalness
  • Fine-tune and integrate best-in-class open-source and commercial models across ASR, TTS, and LLMs
  • Optimise inference performance using techniques like quantisation, distillation, and RL-based tuning
  • Build high-throughput, low-latency APIs using Python, FastAPI, gRPC, and WebSocket streaming
  • Own deployment workflows across cloud and on-prem, collaborating on Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD
  • Stay ahead of the curve — run experiments, track new research, and help keep the team at the cutting edge


Qualifications:


  • Deep experience in Python.
  • Proven hands-on work with real-time ASR, TTS, voice chat, or streaming audio systems
  • Familiarity with LLM tooling - prompt design, fine-tuning, RAG, and frameworks like LangChain, LlamaIndex, or OpenPipe


You’ll push the boundaries of what voice AI can do in production - balancing model quality, latency, and scalability - while working across product, infra, and research to ship new capabilities into the hands of real users.


If you want to build the voice layer of enterprise AI - and work at the frontier of real-time language, speech, and systems - we’d love to hear from you.

4279580972,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/senior-data-scientist-llm-at-mail-machine-ai-learning-club-4279580972?position=36&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=%2Ftr7PGaLCPhw%2Bxm9GR3xeA%3D%3D,Senior Data Scientist - LLM,MAIL - Machine AI Learning Club,"Berlin, Germany","My client is one of Berlin’s most exciting new AI startups — backed by top-tier investors and led by a visionary founding team with deep domain expertise. They're building intelligent systems that do more than just automate — they understand, adapt, and learn in real time. And now they’re looking for a Senior Data Scientist to shape the next phase of their AI-driven product evolution.

As a core member of the Data Science team, you won’t just be running models — you’ll be designing end-to-end data workflows, building and evaluating state-of-the-art AI systems, and working alongside engineers and product teams to translate insights into real-world impact. This is your opportunity to work on bleeding-edge ML with purpose — in an environment where experimentation and bold ideas are part of the DNA.
What you’ll be working with:
A modern data stack: Python, SQL, and TypeScript (for integration)
Leading ML/AI frameworks: PyTorch, TensorFlow, ONNX, HuggingFace
Scalable infrastructure: GCP, BigQuery, Cloud Functions, Firestore, AlloyDB
Productionizing ML: from fine-tuning foundation models (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, LLaMA, etc.) to optimizing deployment pipelines
Cross-functional collaboration with engineers, designers, and domain experts to shape smart, adaptive AI products
What they’re looking for:
Strong proficiency in Python, SQL, and modern data science libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy)
Hands-on experience with ML model development and deployment (bonus: exposure to LLMs and generative AI)
A solid grasp of data architecture, experimentation, and performance evaluation
A collaborative mindset with a track record of working across disciplines to solve complex problems
Experience in startup or fast-paced environments is a plus
Why this role?
Autonomy & Ownership: You’ll shape how data science is done — from tools to strategy
Impact: Your models and insights will directly influence core product experiences
Real-world AI: Build systems that are used, not just published
Growth: Join at an early stage with equity, a strong mission, and rapid professional growth

4267439434,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/ai-engineer-at-umatr-4267439434?position=37&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=fsmLbIrGMZF2eUhxIGa%2Fhw%3D%3D,AI Engineer,UMATR,"Berlin, Germany","AI Engineer – Early-Stage AI Start-up - Berlin
My client is building one of the most advanced AI tools on the market.

They're an early-stage, fast-growing startup looking for a talented AI Engineer to join their team. This is a high-impact role where you’ll help shape the product, the tech, and the team from day one.
About the Company

My client’s mission is to eliminate manual documentation through a powerful AI tool that helps teams capture and structure conversations. The product is live with early users, and they're moving quickly to scale. They care about fast iteration, strong UX, and using AI in ways that feel magical to the end user.
The Role

You’ll be building core AI features, designing and testing prompts, and working closely with users and the founding team. This is a hands-on role for someone who enjoys solving real problems with real impact.
What You’ll Do
Build intelligent product features with LLMs and prompt design
Iterate quickly using user feedback and product metrics
Contribute across the stack to deliver a seamless experience
Ensure speed, accuracy, and reliability in a real-time AI product
Tech Stack
Python (ML & backend), modern web & desktop frameworks
Prompt monitoring, fast deployment tools
Slack, Notion, GitHub, Linear for ops
Open to new tools and approaches - if there’s a better way, they’re listening.
What They’re Looking For
Solid AI/ML experience - LLMs, pipelines, & MLOps
Strong engineering skills, 2 years +
Product-focused mindset with attention to UX
Comfortable in fast-paced, early-stage environments
Berlin-based, hybrid flexibility
What’s on Offer
High impact and ownership
Competitive salary + Equity
Flexible hybrid
Great team culture and regular offsites

4260389571,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/machine-learning-engineer-m-f-d-at-researchgate-4260389571?position=38&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=uRvU0C2DSAgHl3SfGsew8w%3D%3D,Machine Learning Engineer (m/f/d),ResearchGate,"Berlin, Germany","This is a full-time position based in Berlin. We are a remote-first organization and support mobile and flexible working.
ResearchGate is the professional network for scientists and researchers.

The web was created by scientists, to foster scientific collaboration and drive progress for a better world. Here at ResearchGate, we’re looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to join our team.
We are a bunch of pragmatic optimists from all around the world and many different backgrounds.
We provide scientists with the help and support they need by connecting them to the world’s most active scientific community.
Together, we focus on taking the web back to its original mission and changing the way scientists communicate for the better.
Our goal is to connect the world of science and make research open to all.
Objective of the Role
As a Machine Learning Engineer at ResearchGate, you will unlock the value in our data assets by developing Machine Learning models and data-intensive systems across the full breadth of RG’s product.

Your work will enable scientists in ResearchGate’s network by keeping them in touch with the latest work in their fields and protect the health of the scientific community by providing tools to foster collaboration and detect fraud.
The team
ResearchGate’s Data Science and Machine Learning team is a multidisciplinary engineering team, consisting of Data Scientists, Machine Learning Engineers, and Data Engineers.
The team owns the end-to-end development of ML-enabled products as well as the infrastructure that powers ML-driven development across the Engineering department.

As a cross-functional team, we are responsible for managing the full ML product life-cycle, including identifying opportunities, matching data sources with novel ML approaches, prototyping and scaling models, and deploying and maintaining services within ResearchGate’s engineering infrastructure.
Collaboration is critical to our team’s success
column2: team members ask for and offer help on each others’ projects and own objectives collectively, and we work closely with stakeholders in Product and other Engineering teams.

column1: We balance pragmatic solutions within our existing tech stack with forward-facing experiments, trying new solutions, employing new technologies, and informing ResearchGate’s ML and AI strategy.
Responsibilities:

Proactively identify and evaluate opportunities for data products and automation via Machine Learning models, including assessing the impact, risks and technical feasibility of potential projects in collaboration with Engineering and Product.
Perform data analysis and develop prototype models to demonstrate the value of potential data products, and communicate opportunities to other teams and departments.
Train ML models using ResearchGate’s tabular and natural language data assets, balancing innovation and pragmatism.
Deploy, scale, monitor, and maintain your solutions within a cloud services environment.
Evangelize new Data Science opportunities and capabilities, and contribute to shaping the future directions for evolving our internal ML technology stack and platform.
Requirements:

5+ years of experience in a machine learning or data science role within the Machine Learning lifecycle, including writing production-grade code, training models, creating data pipelines, deploying prediction services, and monitoring performance.
Expert knowledge of Python, in particular the Data Science / Machine Learning library ecosystem: pandas, pytorch or TensorFlow, scikit-learn, xgboost
column2: Java experience a bonus.

column1: Familiarity with a cloud services platform, particularly for ML development and lifecycle
column2: GCP fluency, specifically, is a bonus.

column1: Strong analytical thinking and knowledge of the statistical foundations of ML, as well as practical experience developing models for tabular and natural language data
column2: exposure to recommender systems or search applications a bonus.

column1: Very strong proficiency in SQL is mandatory, proficiency in Big Data technologies (e.g. BigQuery, Hadoop, Flink, PySpark, Dask, etc.) is a nice to have.
Ability to translate business requirements into data-driven solutions.
Excellent communication and prioritization skills.
Your Profile:
You are comfortable in a role that straddles Data Science and software engineering.
You are excited about finding ways to improve our products with data and Machine Learning models.
You enjoy working independently, taking technical project ownership, and designing complete systems to solve challenges.
You are comfortable working at the interface between engineering, product, and business
column2: being actively involved with the entire value chain around the models you develop.

column1: You are eager to learn and research new methods, solutions, and technologies.
You love to work with data as much as you enjoy communicating your findings to an interested audience.
You are a strong team player and know that results come from great people working together around meaningful ideas.
You understand our mission and want to help us achieve it.
The Interview Process:

You will interview with several ResearchGate team members, including your hiring manager, potential teammates, and senior leadership. Your interview process will include experience-based interviews, technical challenges, and a Data Science case study.
Life at ResearchGate

You'll be working in an open and empowered company culture, with the chance to individually shape your professional development and growth. Enjoy being a part of an energetic team that’s passionate about changing science for the better. We’re a team of optimists from around the world and from many different backgrounds guided by our mission to connect the world of science and make research open to all.

Enjoy a flexible working environment that adapts to your life circumstances, a generous 30 full days of vacation for you to unwind and days focused for your professional development to further grow your career along.

We support a remote work approach by enabling our team to work across borders (up to 120 days a year).We occasionally come together for team summits, workshops, and in-person meetings, but fully embrace a remote-first approach to work.
ResearchGate is an equal opportunity employer

We encourage people from all backgrounds and life experiences to apply with us and help us change the world of science. We commit to impartial and inclusive hiring processes, and therefore ask you to please refrain from adding a picture and your age to your application form or CV.

Our hiring decisions are made based on your skills and qualifications, regardless of your age, gender, origin or race/ethnicity, nationality, sexual orientation, disability status, religion, or any other (perceived) personal characteristics. We are excited to receive your application.
ResearchGate Intro and Mission

ResearchGate is the largest professional network for scientists and researchers. We've built a platform that helps the world's scientists and researchers to connect, collaborate, and advance their research to drive progress towards a better world.
Over 25 million members from 193+ countries use ResearchGate to share, discover, and discuss research.

ResearchGate is the professional network for scientists and researchers.


The web was created by scientists, to foster scientific collaboration and drive progress for a better world. Here at ResearchGate, we’re looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to join our team.


We are a bunch of pragmatic optimists from all around the world and many different backgrounds.

Your work will enable scientists in ResearchGate’s network by keeping them in touch with the latest work in their fields and protect the health of the scientific community by providing tools to foster collaboration and detect fraud.



The team


ResearchGate’s Data Science and Machine Learning team is a multidisciplinary engineering team, consisting of Data Scientists, Machine Learning Engineers, and Data Engineers.


The team owns the end-to-end development of ML-enabled products as well as the infrastructure that powers ML-driven development across the Engineering department.


As a cross-functional team, we are responsible for managing the full ML product life-cycle, including identifying opportunities, matching data sources with novel ML approaches, prototyping and scaling models, and deploying and maintaining services within ResearchGate’s engineering infrastructure.


Collaboration is critical to our team’s success

being actively involved with the entire value chain around the models you develop.

  • You are a strong team player and know that results come from great people working together around meaningful ideas.
  • You understand our mission and want to help us achieve it.

    You will interview with several ResearchGate team members, including your hiring manager, potential teammates, and senior leadership. Your interview process will include experience-based interviews, technical challenges, and a Data Science case study.


    Life at ResearchGate


    You'll be working in an open and empowered company culture, with the chance to individually shape your professional development and growth. Enjoy being a part of an energetic team that’s passionate about changing science for the better. We’re a team of optimists from around the world and from many different backgrounds guided by our mission to connect the world of science and make research open to all.


    Enjoy a flexible working environment that adapts to your life circumstances, a generous 30 full days of vacation for you to unwind and days focused for your professional development to further grow your career along.

4268518250,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/deep-learning-researcher-at-avo-intelligence-4268518250?position=40&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=YsUbGZQ7Ji2E4%2BXp5nqy%2BQ%3D%3D,Deep Learning Researcher,Avo Intelligence,"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","About Avo Intelligence

Avo Intelligence operates at the forefront of machine learning innovation, delivering transformative solutions that empower businesses to unlock the potential of their data. Based in Singapore, we specialize in providing world-class machine learning expertise that drives impactful results across industries such as finance, healthcare, logistics, and smart urban planning. With a network of highly skilled professionals experienced in raw machine learning applications, we are dedicated to fostering innovation and delivering meaningful outcomes for our clients.
About the Role

We are looking for passionate machine learning professionals to collaborate with our clients on revolutionary projects across a range of industries. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge research and development in fields such as computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), and machine learning, while working closely with cross-functional teams to bring impactful solutions to life.
Tasks
Conduct advanced research and development in areas such as computer vision, natural language processing, generative AI, and machine learning.
Collaborate with partners and engineers to develop or optimize models and algorithms, ensuring seamless transfer of innovations into practical applications.
Publish high-quality research in top-tier conferences and journals, showcasing groundbreaking work.
Requirements
Ph.D. or equivalent expertise in computer science, electrical engineering, or related fields, with a focus on areas like generative AI, computer vision, NLP, or machine learning.
Hands-on experience in developing algorithms and models using deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and programming languages such as Python or C/C++.
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex ideas effectively.
Benefits
Work with some of the brightest minds in the machine learning field, tackling industry-specific challenges and pushing the boundaries of innovation.
Collaborate on diverse projects that span industries and make a tangible impact.
Be part of a global network of ML experts who are passionate about solving real-world problems through raw machine learning applications.

About Avo Intelligence


Avo Intelligence operates at the forefront of machine learning innovation, delivering transformative solutions that empower businesses to unlock the potential of their data. Based in Singapore, we specialize in providing world-class machine learning expertise that drives impactful results across industries such as finance, healthcare, logistics, and smart urban planning. With a network of highly skilled professionals experienced in raw machine learning applications, we are dedicated to fostering innovation and delivering meaningful outcomes for our clients.


About the Role


We are looking for passionate machine learning professionals to collaborate with our clients on revolutionary projects across a range of industries. This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge research and development in fields such as computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), and machine learning, while working closely with cross-functional teams to bring impactful solutions to life.


Tasks

  • Conduct advanced research and development in areas such as computer vision, natural language processing, generative AI, and machine learning.

  • Collaborate with partners and engineers to develop or optimize models and algorithms, ensuring seamless transfer of innovations into practical applications.

  • Publish high-quality research in top-tier conferences and journals, showcasing groundbreaking work.


Requirements

  • Ph.D. or equivalent expertise in computer science, electrical engineering, or related fields, with a focus on areas like generative AI, computer vision, NLP, or machine learning.

  • Hands-on experience in developing algorithms and models using deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and programming languages such as Python or C/C++.

  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex ideas effectively.


Benefits

  • Work with some of the brightest minds in the machine learning field, tackling industry-specific challenges and pushing the boundaries of innovation.

  • Collaborate on diverse projects that span industries and make a tangible impact.

  • Be part of a global network of ML experts who are passionate about solving real-world problems through raw machine learning applications.

4270332312,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/looking-for-a-computer-vision-and-ml-engineer-at-phera-4270332312?position=41&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=GhyDtZeys9MXeg1LxqfzBw%3D%3D,Looking for a computer vision and ML engineer,pHera,"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","We are a pre-seed femtech startup building pHera: an ultra-precise colorimetric vaginal pH test that can be read using a cellphone camera and machine learning for accuracy. The system would detect colorimetric images and predict with a high level of accuracy discrete pH values, delivering lab-quality diagnostic precision to women and doctors - anytime, anywhere!
Tasks

To make pHera robust and scalable, pHera is looking for a computer vision and machine learning engineer to design and implement the complete computer-vision pipeline: from image capture, colour detection and pH prediction.
Implement computer vision algorithms for color detection from captured images
Integrate machine learning models for accurate pH prediction based colour detection
Ensure performance across different smartphone devices and lighting conditions
Applicants who clearly outline in thier cover letter how they would implement these three tasks will be prioritised.
Requirements
Based in Berlin
Eager to work in an early-stage, science-driven, female health startup
Comfortable with ambiguity, self-directed, and proactive
Benefits
Flexibility: choose freelance, part-time or full-time
Hybrid work environment with office space in Berlin
A competitive salary for 6 months with the possibility of extension
pHera is closing the gender health gap!
Most existing vaginal pH test strips are analog, low-resolution, visually subjective, and
poorly suited for women’s health applications. Doctors need fast, reliable tools to
help with complicated diagnoses. Women deserve clarity, not guesswork when
managing their vaginal health from home. A high-resolution pH test can catch
imbalances early, making it easier to monitor issues like bacterial vaginosis,
recurring vaginal infections, sexually transmitted infections, ovulation, PCOS, and
menopause. By building pHera, you would be building a tool that would advance women's health.

We are a pre-seed femtech startup building pHera: an ultra-precise colorimetric vaginal pH test that can be read using a cellphone camera and machine learning for accuracy. The system would detect colorimetric images and predict with a high level of accuracy discrete pH values, delivering lab-quality diagnostic precision to women and doctors - anytime, anywhere!


Tasks

To make pHera robust and scalable, pHera is looking for a computer vision and machine learning engineer to design and implement the complete computer-vision pipeline: from image capture, colour detection and pH prediction.



  • Implement computer vision algorithms for color detection from captured images

  • Integrate machine learning models for accurate pH prediction based colour detection

  • Ensure performance across different smartphone devices and lighting conditions


Applicants who clearly outline in thier cover letter how they would implement these three tasks will be prioritised.


Requirements

  • Based in Berlin

  • Eager to work in an early-stage, science-driven, female health startup

  • Comfortable with ambiguity, self-directed, and proactive


Benefits

Flexibility: choose freelance, part-time or full-time


Hybrid work environment with office space in Berlin


A competitive salary for 6 months with the possibility of extension


pHera is closing the gender health gap!

Most existing vaginal pH test strips are analog, low-resolution, visually subjective, and

poorly suited for women’s health applications. Doctors need fast, reliable tools to

help with complicated diagnoses. Women deserve clarity, not guesswork when

managing their vaginal health from home. A high-resolution pH test can catch

imbalances early, making it easier to monitor issues like bacterial vaginosis,

recurring vaginal infections, sexually transmitted infections, ovulation, PCOS, and

menopause. By building pHera, you would be building a tool that would advance women's health.

4279231155,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/artificial-intelligence-researcher-at-skills-alliance-4279231155?position=42&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=ZXHjwFYJ4TWECboLBernMA%3D%3D,Artificial Intelligence Researcher,Skills Alliance,"Berlin, Germany","Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled Machine Learning / AI Engineer with a strong academic background (PhD or MSc in Computer Science, AI, or related fields) to develop and deploy advanced machine learning models for biomedical and imaging applications. The ideal candidate combines deep expertise in cutting-edge AI research with hands-on experience in building robust and scalable solutions for real-world problems.
Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and implement state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning models for biomedical imaging and related applications.
Engineer scalable analysis and segmentation tools for pathology and medical imaging data.
Apply advanced techniques in multiple instance learning (MIL), foundation models, and other modern AI paradigms for large-scale image analysis.
Build predictive models for clinical outcomes, including drug response and disease progression, leveraging imaging and multi-modal data.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams of data scientists, clinicians, and researchers to translate AI research into impactful healthcare solutions.
Publish research findings in top-tier journals and conferences and contribute to the advancement of AI in healthcare.
Required Qualifications:
PhD or MSc in Computer Science, Machine Learning, AI, or a related field.
Strong expertise in deep learning, computer vision, and multi-modal data analysis.
Hands-on experience with medical imaging (e.g., pathology slides, MRI) and biomedical data.
Proven track record of research excellence with publications in peer-reviewed journals/conferences.
Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow).
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with foundation models, representation learning, or weakly supervised learning.
Background in computational pathology, radiology, or precision medicine applications.
Familiarity with scalable ML deployment in cloud or HPC environments.

Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled Machine Learning / AI Engineer with a strong academic background (PhD or MSc in Computer Science, AI, or related fields) to develop and deploy advanced machine learning models for biomedical and imaging applications. The ideal candidate combines deep expertise in cutting-edge AI research with hands-on experience in building robust and scalable solutions for real-world problems.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and implement state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning models for biomedical imaging and related applications.
  • Engineer scalable analysis and segmentation tools for pathology and medical imaging data.
  • Apply advanced techniques in multiple instance learning (MIL), foundation models, and other modern AI paradigms for large-scale image analysis.
  • Build predictive models for clinical outcomes, including drug response and disease progression, leveraging imaging and multi-modal data.
  • Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams of data scientists, clinicians, and researchers to translate AI research into impactful healthcare solutions.
  • Publish research findings in top-tier journals and conferences and contribute to the advancement of AI in healthcare.


Required Qualifications:

  • PhD or MSc in Computer Science, Machine Learning, AI, or a related field.
  • Strong expertise in deep learning, computer vision, and multi-modal data analysis.
  • Hands-on experience with medical imaging (e.g., pathology slides, MRI) and biomedical data.
  • Proven track record of research excellence with publications in peer-reviewed journals/conferences.
  • Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow).


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with foundation models, representation learning, or weakly supervised learning.
  • Background in computational pathology, radiology, or precision medicine applications.
  • Familiarity with scalable ML deployment in cloud or HPC environments.

4266943878,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/senior-machine-learning-engineer-m-f-d-at-merantix-capital-4266943878?position=43&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=GoCXkybI3cc58q7bYKy1Ig%3D%3D,Senior Machine Learning Engineer (m/f/d),Merantix Capital,"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","Merantix Momentum is a Berlin-based AI startup focusing on accelerating AI adoption across many industries through B2B solutions, as well as publicly funded research projects. We work across several domains, including manufacturing, healthcare, the German public sector, and many more, transforming businesses as an external machine learning department. We achieve this using our core expertise in state-of-the-art machine learning combined with our culture of rapid iterations to build scalable solutions.
Aufgaben
Your role

Are you passionate about developing impactful applications of Machine Learning? The mission of this role is to bring state-of-the-art deep-learning methods to real-world applications from ideation and prototyping to production.
These Will Be Your Main Responsibilities
Leading major projects
Scope machine learning projects and their technical feasibility through client interaction
Contribute to the next generation AI stack and grow the open source ecosystem
Collaborate with data-, backend-, and frontend engineers in order to build production-ready AI solutions
Implement machine learning methods and apply them to real-world use cases
Profil
Your profile

The ideal candidate is proficient in software engineering and the latest machine- and deep-learning technologies, while also having a solid understanding of machine learning theory and fundamentals. You will independently scope, plan, manage, and drive machine learning projects from the ideation to the production phase - with a particular focus on Natural Language Processing.
You are a great fit for our team if this describes you:
MSc/PhD in computer science, machine learning, or related technical field
Relevant programming skills in Python and experience with libraries like PyTorch
Deep understanding of machine learning principles with hands-on experience training and fine-tuning neural networks
Appreciation for sound engineering practices like version control, clean code, code review, testing, CI/CD, and automation.
Ability to interact with clients, to understand their problems, and to design as well as to explain complex technical solutions
Fluency in English and German
Wir bieten
Engaging Topics and Excellence: We offer unique insights into applied machine learning research and development, working with a group of highly talented engineers and entrepreneurs.
International Team: We are a dynamic and international team.
We offer Visa Sponsorship.

Learning and Development: We provide an annual learning and development budget for attending conferences or purchasing educational resources to further develop our employees' skills. We also hold weekly and monthly events around AI innovation and implementation.
Dynamic and open Working Culture: We have a very flat hierarchy, open 360° feedback, and flexibility in our work-from-home policy as well as working hours.
AI Ethics: We are committed to developing ethical AI software and actively foster open discussions on this topic within our team.
Brand new office space: Bright and open office situated on the AI Campus in Berlin.
Hardware allowance: We give you support to have all the equipment you would need to thrive on your job.
Sabbatical Leave

Employee benefits: We offer a monthly allowance per employee that can be allocated as desired to one of the following: Mobility & transportation (NAVIT), sports (Urban Sports Club) or groceries (Edenred).
Important note

Please be advised that a valid work permit for Germany is required for non-EU citizens. Unfortunately, applications without a valid work permit and sufficient German language skills may not be considered.

Merantix Momentum is a Berlin-based AI startup focusing on accelerating AI adoption across many industries through B2B solutions, as well as publicly funded research projects. We work across several domains, including manufacturing, healthcare, the German public sector, and many more, transforming businesses as an external machine learning department. We achieve this using our core expertise in state-of-the-art machine learning combined with our culture of rapid iterations to build scalable solutions.

Aufgaben

Your role

Are you passionate about developing impactful applications of Machine Learning? The mission of this role is to bring state-of-the-art deep-learning methods to real-world applications from ideation and prototyping to production.

These Will Be Your Main Responsibilities

  • Leading major projects
  • Scope machine learning projects and their technical feasibility through client interaction
  • Contribute to the next generation AI stack and grow the open source ecosystem
  • Collaborate with data-, backend-, and frontend engineers in order to build production-ready AI solutions
  • Implement machine learning methods and apply them to real-world use cases

Profil

Your profile

The ideal candidate is proficient in software engineering and the latest machine- and deep-learning technologies, while also having a solid understanding of machine learning theory and fundamentals. You will independently scope, plan, manage, and drive machine learning projects from the ideation to the production phase - with a particular focus on Natural Language Processing.

You are a great fit for our team if this describes you:

  • MSc/PhD in computer science, machine learning, or related technical field
  • Relevant programming skills in Python and experience with libraries like PyTorch
  • Deep understanding of machine learning principles with hands-on experience training and fine-tuning neural networks
  • Appreciation for sound engineering practices like version control, clean code, code review, testing, CI/CD, and automation.
  • Ability to interact with clients, to understand their problems, and to design as well as to explain complex technical solutions
  • Fluency in English and German

Wir bieten

Engaging Topics and Excellence: We offer unique insights into applied machine learning research and development, working with a group of highly talented engineers and entrepreneurs.

  • International Team: We are a dynamic and international team.
  • We offer Visa Sponsorship.
  • Learning and Development: We provide an annual learning and development budget for attending conferences or purchasing educational resources to further develop our employees' skills. We also hold weekly and monthly events around AI innovation and implementation.
  • Dynamic and open Working Culture: We have a very flat hierarchy, open 360° feedback, and flexibility in our work-from-home policy as well as working hours.
  • AI Ethics: We are committed to developing ethical AI software and actively foster open discussions on this topic within our team.
  • Brand new office space: Bright and open office situated on the AI Campus in Berlin.
  • Hardware allowance: We give you support to have all the equipment you would need to thrive on your job.
  • Sabbatical Leave

4181429589,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/ml-engineer-speech-m-f-d-at-voize-4181429589?position=44&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=KVYx3RI3ihXAvjotOdlAdg%3D%3D,ML Engineer - Speech (m/f/d),voize,"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","🎤 Why voize? Because we’re more than just a job!

At voize, we’re revolutionizing the healthcare industry with AI: Nurses simply speak their documentation into their smartphones, and our AI automatically generates the correct entries. This saves each nurse an average of 39 minutes per day, improves the quality of documentation, and makes their daily work much more rewarding.

voize is YCombinator-funded, already in use at over 600 senior care homes, and has grown by 100% in the last 90 days. Our customers save over 3.5 million hours annually – time spent on people instead of paperwork.

But this is just the beginning. With our self-developed voize AI, we’re transforming not only the healthcare industry, but also have the potential to create value in many other sectors – from healthcare to inspections.
💡 Your Mission

If you're a Machine Learning Engineer experienced with Speech recognition and are excited to work at the cutting edge of product design, applied ML research, and MLOps, then go ahead and apply! With us, you'll build products with direct user feedback, train AI models with real data, and ship new features to production every day.
🤝 Your Skillset – What You Bring To The Table
Several years hands-on experience in Deep Learning for speech recognition, including developing and optimising ASR-systems (not just academic research)
Excellent foundation in STT (Speech-to-Text) system development with a focus on real-world applications
Experience with owning the ML process end-to-end: from concept and exploration, to model productionization, maintenance, monitoring and optimization
Shipped ML models to production with Python and PyTorch
Trained new models from scratch and not just fine-tuning existing ones
🚀 Your Daily Business – No two days are alike
Take ownership for the design, training, evaluation, and deployment of our deep learning models in the space of speech recognition
The models you build and refine are at the heart of our applications and directly impact the end-user
You'll get to engineer large self-supervised trainings as well as fast inference for mobile devices and hosted environments
🎯 Our Success Mindset – How we work at voize
Resilience is one of your strengths – you see challenges as opportunities, not obstacles
Iterative working suits you – you test, learn, and improve constantly instead of waiting for perfection
Communication & feedback come naturally to you – you openly address issues and both give and receive constructive feedback
🌱 Growing together – what you can expect at voize
Become a co-creator of our success with virtual stock options
Our office is in Berlin, and we offer remote work
We provide flexible working hours because you know best when you work most efficiently!
Access to various learning platforms (e.g., Blinkist, Audible, etc.)
We have an open culture and organize regular work weeks and team events to collaborate and bond
We are a fast-growing startup, so you'll encounter various challenges, providing the perfect foundation for rapid personal growth
Your work will make a real impact, helping alleviate the workload for healthcare professionals
Free Germany Ticket and Urban Sports Club membership
30 days of vacation – plus your birthday off
✨ Ready to talk? Apply now! 🚀
We look forward to your application and can’t wait to meet you – no matter who you are or what background you have!
Show more ","<div class=""description__text description__text--rich"">

voize is YCombinator-funded, already in use at over 600 senior care homes, and has grown by 100% in the last 90 days. Our customers save over 3.5 million hours annually – time spent on people instead of paperwork.

  • Several years hands-on experience in Deep Learning for speech recognition, including developing and optimising ASR-systems (not just academic research)
  • Excellent foundation in STT (Speech-to-Text) system development with a focus on real-world applications
  • Experience with owning the ML process end-to-end: from concept and exploration, to model productionization, maintenance, monitoring and optimization
  • Shipped ML models to production with Python and PyTorch
  • Trained new models from scratch and not just fine-tuning existing ones

🚀 Your Daily Business – No two days are alike

  • Take ownership for the design, training, evaluation, and deployment of our deep learning models in the space of speech recognition
  • The models you build and refine are at the heart of our applications and directly impact the end-user
  • You'll get to engineer large self-supervised trainings as well as fast inference for mobile devices and hosted environments

🎯 Our Success Mindset – How we work at voize

  • Resilience is one of your strengths – you see challenges as opportunities, not obstacles
  • Iterative working suits you – you test, learn, and improve constantly instead of waiting for perfection
  • Communication &
column2:
feedback come naturally to you – you openly address issues and both give and receive constructive feedback

🌱 Growing together – what you can expect at voize

  • Become a co-creator of our success with virtual stock options
  • Our office is in Berlin, and we offer remote work
  • We provide flexible working hours because you know best when you work most efficiently!
  • Access to various learning platforms (e.g., Blinkist, Audible, etc.)
  • We have an open culture and organize regular work weeks and team events to collaborate and bond
  • We are a fast-growing startup, so you'll encounter various challenges, providing the perfect foundation for rapid personal growth
  • Your work will make a real impact, helping alleviate the workload for healthcare professionals
  • Free Germany Ticket and Urban Sports Club membership
  • 30 days of vacation – plus your birthday off

✨ Ready to talk? Apply now! 🚀

We look forward to your application and can’t wait to meet you – no matter who you are or what background you have!

4267904546,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-scientist-at-lynx-beleggen-4267904546?position=46&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=mdU8qTqgab8iswp3vAIN7g%3D%3D,Data Scientist,LYNX Beleggen,"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","Work Location: Berlin or Amsterdam

Are you a skilled Python and SQL user with a strong analytical background and experience in crafting top-shelf prediction models? You are passionate about uncovering insights within data and applying them to real-world financial challenges? Then you might just be the Data Scientist we're looking for!
Your Primary Responsibilities Will Be
Manage the end-to-end process of data-driven knowledge gathering (connect, mine, simulate, predict, illustrate, and deploy)
Create data-based solutions to address complex business challenges
Translate business needs into hypotheses, leading to advanced analytical projects, and conduct ad hoc analyses to address specific business questions
Design, train, deploy and monitor predictive algorithms
Proactively communicate and share your conclusions, as well as explain complex topics to technical and non-technical stakeholders
What We're Looking For
Solid analytical skills in structured and unstructured data (you're a natural problem solver)
Proficiency in Python and SQL (you can write advanced queries with ease)
A self-driven and proactive attitude
Strong verbal and written communication skills (you can explain complex ideas in simple terms)
Focus on quality (you strive for excellence in everything you do)
Knowledge of financial markets & financial products (options, futures, etc.)
What We Offer
Competitive Salary, depending on your educational level and work experience
Free lunch from our cook, fresh juices & fruit
Continuous growth potential and a training budget of €2,000 per year
Trips & activities with your colleagues
Relaxed and informal working environment
Discount for membership of the Urban Sports Club
Additional contribution to the company pension scheme
In-house German and English courses with a native speaker and cover half of the costs
About Us
LYNX helps you invest in yourself""
Working at LYNX means joining the LYNX family""
The development opportunities make LYNX the best place to work""

This is what the employees say about LYNX and it is exactly what we want to offer: a work environment where you can get the best out of yourself. At our office in the heart of Amsterdam, Ghent, Berlin and Prague, we work every day to offer both private and professional clients the best trading opportunities, with a fast, user-friendly and reliable trading platform.
The Best Choice For Anyone Who Takes Investing Seriously

LYNX is an international FinTech that offers you a relaxed and informal work environment, where you can get the best out of yourself and where 300 people contribute together to the success of our customers since 2006.

In 2006 LYNX entered the investor market with two spearheads: very low rates and an extensive product range. This makes the online broker not only successful in the Netherlands, but also abroad. After opening offices in Belgium, Germany and the Czech Republic, LYNX now offers its services in ten different countries, making it a European broker of size.

In 2019 the product of LYNX, and therefore the offer for investors, has been greatly improved. For example, a highly advanced mobile and tablet app is available, the LYNX Masterclass webinars can be watched weekly via the Knowledge Portal, and thanks to the Morning Call, investors are quickly daily informed about the latest news on the financial markets.

We're an equal-opportunity employer. We welcome applications from all suitably qualified and eligible candidates without attention to gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation/identity, disability or neurodiversity.

4248377929,https://de.linkedin.com/jobs/view/applied-scientist-recommendation-all-genders-at-zalando-4248377929?position=47&pageNum=0&refId=C6%2BHCPz6NHiUa71Oif9WTA%3D%3D&trackingId=wXWTeIm8liUTtLBAtJby4Q%3D%3D,Applied Scientist - Recommendation(All Genders),Zalando,"Berlin, Berlin, Germany","The Fashion Recommendations Team is at the core of Zalando’s browsing experience and fashion discoverability. Our purpose is to play a key role in making Zalando the starting point of fashion by providing recommendations that meet our customers’ fashion needs and wishes while understanding their unique style, preferences and interests. As part of the larger Search and Recommendations department, you will work with colleagues in Search to optimize the customer journey to drive commercial impact by developing new recommendations and optimizing current ones.
As an Applied Scientist, you will design ML/AI solutions that serve our customers’ needs
column2: build data pipelines and models using, for example, AWS, Python and TensorFlow
column3: define hypotheses and A/B test them to validate your use case
column4: and deploy solutions into production to serve more than 52 millions of customers. You will focus on new state-of the art solutions, such as LLM-based recommendations, to elevate the impact of Recommendation use cases and devise new opportunities to guide the customer down the purchase funnel.

column1: You will be part of a talented cross-functional team made up of Applied Scientists, Data Engineers and Backend Engineers. You will also count with the support of Product Managers and Designers to create the customer experience that you will deliver
WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED
Apply your expertise to solve real-life ML use cases that impact millions of customers
Design and implement models and data pipelines that scale up to serve thousands of requests per second during Black Friday
Contribute to the team’s roadmap by creating an incremental delivery plan for our use cases
Work together with product managers, designers, and engineers to deliver impactful solutions that change the way our customers buy fashion
Keep up to date with the state of the art in recommender systems and contribute to the data science community both internally in Zalando and externally in meetups and conferences
What We’re Looking For
Ph.D. or, M.Sc. and 4 years of working experience
Great coding skills in Python, Java and / or Scala, and hands on experience with TensorFlow and cloud computing frameworks
Deep understanding of theory behind the state of the art methods in your domain (deep learning, LLM-based recommendations) as well as a broad overview of machine learning methods and best practices.
PERKS AT WORK

Culture of trust, empowerment and constructive feedback, open source commitment, meetups, game nights, 70+ internal technical and fun guilds, knowledge sharing through tech talks, internal tech academy and blogs , product demos, parties & events

Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
Extensive onboarding, mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
Relocation assistance for internationals

We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and skills. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need.

The Fashion Recommendations Team is at the core of Zalando’s browsing experience and fashion discoverability. Our purpose is to play a key role in making Zalando the starting point of fashion by providing recommendations that meet our customers’ fashion needs and wishes while understanding their unique style, preferences and interests. As part of the larger Search and Recommendations department, you will work with colleagues in Search to optimize the customer journey to drive commercial impact by developing new recommendations and optimizing current ones.

As an Applied Scientist, you will design ML/AI solutions that serve our customers’ needs
column2: build data pipelines and models using, for example, AWS, Python and TensorFlow
column3: define hypotheses and A/B test them to validate your use case
column4:
and deploy solutions into production to serve more than 52 millions of customers. You will focus on new state-of the art solutions, such as LLM-based recommendations, to elevate the impact of Recommendation use cases and devise new opportunities to guide the customer down the purchase funnel.

You will be part of a talented cross-functional team made up of Applied Scientists, Data Engineers and Backend Engineers. You will also count with the support of Product Managers and Designers to create the customer experience that you will deliver

WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED


  • Apply your expertise to solve real-life ML use cases that impact millions of customers
  • Design and implement models and data pipelines that scale up to serve thousands of requests per second during Black Friday
  • Contribute to the team’s roadmap by creating an incremental delivery plan for our use cases
  • Work together with product managers, designers, and engineers to deliver impactful solutions that change the way our customers buy fashion
  • Keep up to date with the state of the art in recommender systems and contribute to the data science community both internally in Zalando and externally in meetups and conferences


What We’re Looking For


  • Ph.D. or, M.Sc. and 4 years of working experience
  • Great coding skills in Python, Java and / or Scala, and hands on experience with TensorFlow and cloud computing frameworks
  • Deep understanding of theory behind the state of the art methods in your domain (deep learning, LLM-based recommendations) as well as a broad overview of machine learning methods and best practices.


PERKS AT WORK


  • Culture of trust, empowerment and constructive feedback, open source commitment, meetups, game nights, 70+ internal technical and fun guilds, knowledge sharing through tech talks, internal tech academy and blogs , product demos, parties &
column5:
events
  • Competitive salary, employee share shop, 40% Zalando shopping discount, discounts from external partners, centrally located offices, public transport discounts, municipality services, great IT equipment, flexible working times, additional holidays and volunteering time off, free beverages and fruits, diverse sports and health offerings
  • Extensive onboarding, mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts
  • Relocation assistance for internationals
